boardgame.name: Big Trouble in Little China: The Game
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There is a secret world where ancient evil weaves a modern mystery_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; they call it Little China. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s where Big Trouble was waiting for Jack Burton and his friends as they uncover an ancient diabolical plot. The evil minions of the immortal ghost-sorcerer Lo Pan are waiting to chop down the players with axes and guns in dark alleys and all throughout the battle-torn streets of Chinatown. Now, Jack, Wang, Gracie, and the rest of the gang must muster up all of their courage, survive against hordes of baddies, and then face off in a showdown with the darkest demon of them all Lo Pan!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Big Trouble in Little China the Game sends you and up to three other players on a wild adventure to experience the unknown and mystical underworld of Chinatown. Each brave character uses their own unique talents and abilities to take on various missions throughout Little China; working together to gain enough Audacity to take down Lo Pan, the Three Storms, and a slew of other powerful henchmen, in this cooperative, replayable, cinematic experience._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You will venture through the iconic locations in Chinatown saving the helpless and thwarting evil plans, all the while discovering weapons and rare magics to use to your benefit. Player actions are powered by thematic dice that are rolled each round. These dice will be used to take part in combat, testing your luck taking audacious actions, and get players in and out of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Big Trouble._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; But beware: roll bad luck and suffer the consequences!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The clock_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s ticking as Lo Pan inches closer to breaking the curse and regaining his mortal form. The heroes are thrown into a final showdown with Lo Pan and his most elite bodyguards to finally put an end to his reign of terror. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll need all of your guts and glory to rescue the green eyed beauty, defeat ancient magic, and save Chinatown... in Big Trouble in Little China: the Game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Big Trouble in Little China: The Game Deluxe Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Adds a Campaign and makes the game playable by up to 6 players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Big Trouble in Little China: The Game Deluxe Edition

Big Trouble in Little China: The Game – Six Demon Bag

listing.notes: Language: english Publisher: Everything Epic Games Game Condition: Mint Box Condition: Mint PREORDER - Available starting from: 2018-04-30 ID Gis: 31770 (for reference)

The Deluxe version of the game, including 5-6 player components, extra gameplay elements and all extras that came with the deluxe version. Payment via Bank Transfer. Shipping only via Belgian Postal services, 10 euro for within EU., 7 euro for ithun Belgium.
New shrink Deluxe Edition limited Shipping to europe 10 Germany 5 euro
New Deluxe Edition limited Opened but unplayed like new. Shipping to europe 10 Germany 5 euro

Box only opened to check content. Misprinted Lo Pan board already replaced. The deluxe edition of the Big Trouble in Little China board game includes all the core game components as well as the following inclusions exclusive to the Deluxe Edition: Limited metallic gold box 7 Quests with questbook 38 Cards (quests, hell cards, hero upgrades) 10 Custom dice, adding a fifth and sixth player 1 Alternate Lo Pan boss board Paypal (Family _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; friends or +4€) or bank transfer. Shipping to EU only.

This is for the Deluxe edition and is brand new in shrink and IN HAND. Domestic shipping is $15. Shipping to Canada is $75. All other international locations is $100. I ALWAYS combine shipping on multiple purchases at +$1 per item.
